descriptionHtml:
[color=Tan]Antianeira - The Greek Amazon - 3 versions[/color]

Many thanks to Expired/expired6978 who gave me permission to use his Extended Slider Colors for skin color and hair color on my follower mod. ^^
And many thanks to Apachii who also gave me permission to use his ApachiiSkyHair for unique hair on my follower mod v3. ^^
Also many thanks to foretrenty who made Skyrim NPC Editor, this awesome retexturing program which also can make new npcs. ^^
Can find foretrenty's Skyrim NPC Editor here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4554

Author:
haldir307

Description:
Antianeira, succeeded Penthesilea as Queen of the Amazons, she was in the Attic War, dueled with Theseus in single combat, after her victory her sisters were killed she traveled the world and now she can be find in Dragonreach which is located in Whiterun, she is ready for adventures.
About her outfit, i made her naked so you can trade her any outfit you want, if i added her any outfit then she could not change armor.

Attention please!
1) To make her appearing in Dragonreach, you need first to complete every quest about Lydia, because she is following Lydia's script/AI pack.
2) If you made all quests about Lydia, you got Lydia and Antianeira is not in appearing again, then open console, type: help antianeira, then you will see her ID, type: player.placeatme xxxxxxxx and she will spawn to you.
Don't type xxxxxxxx but her ID, i wrote before xxxxxxxx because
maybe the ID will be different to you, to me its 6f010001.

Installation:
Extract the file and copy the folder "Data" to Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonskyrim

Required mod:
* ApachiiSkyHair "only for Antianeira v3"
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
* Extended Slider Colors "skin color and hair color"
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6923

I recommend you to use those mods too:
* High Quality Eyes
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=498
* Athletic Nude Women - CBBE "body, hands and foots"
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=563
* Improved Female Skin Textures "head"
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=58

Permissions:
1) Users/Modders are not allowed to upload my files to other sites!
2) Users/Modders are not allowed to convert my file so that it works on similar games!
3) Users/Modders are not allowed to modify my file including releasing bug fixes or improving on the features my file adds to the game and upload it as a seperate file!
4) Users/Modders are not allowed to use assets contained in my files in their own files!
[b][i]5) Translations are allowed, no need to ask me.Â [/i][/b]
[b][i][u]6) Users/Modders are not allowed to upload my mods on Steam Workshop as their own to obtain money and it means the same for Permissions 2/3/4, my mods will always stay on nexus for free![/u][/i][/b]

Credits:
Npc follower made by haldir307.
All credit goes to the authors from the required mods, Expired and Apachii, but you can endorse my mod. ;)
author: haldir307
